text.firstperson.title: FirstPerson Settings
text.firstperson.option.firstperson.xOff: Moves the body relative to the camera back and forth
text.firstperson.option.firstperson.snea: Moves the body relative to the camera back and forth while sneaking
text.firstperson.option.firstperson.enab: The default state of the FirstPerson mod after starting the game
text.firstperson.option.firstperson.lock: Lock body when holding certain Items
Locks the body rotation to the head rotation when holding a map or compass to make better usable
text.firstperson.option.firstperson.sitX: Moves the body relative to the camera back and forth while sitting
text.firstperson.option.firstperson.vani: Shows the vanilla first person hands, but also the player model(but without arms)
text.firstperson.option.firstperson.doub: When using Vanilla hands it will always show both hands
text.firstperson.option.firstperson.forc: Forces the FirstPerson Mod when other mods modify the rendering, but will cause visual issues(for example the players head is missing)
text.firstperson.option.doll.Enabled.@To: Shows a smaller version of yourself(or the entity you're spectating) at the side of the screen
text.firstperson.option.doll.Size.@Toolt: Change the scale of the doll
text.firstperson.option.doll.LookingSide: Change how much the (locked) head looks to the left/right
text.firstperson.option.doll.LookingUpDo: Change how much the (locked) head looks Up/Down
text.firstperson.option.doll.headmode.@T: Changes how the head reacts to the player movement
text.firstperson.option.cosmetic.hat.@To: Selection of multiplayer synced custom 3d models
text.firstperson.option.cosmetic.head: Custom Head model
text.firstperson.option.cosmetic.head.@T: Selection of multiplayer synced custom 3d models
text.firstperson.option.cosmetic.chest.@: Selection of multiplayer synced custom 3d models
text.firstperson.option.cosmetic.back.@T: Selection of multiplayer synced custom 3d models
text.firstperson.option.cosmetic.backHue: Change the color of the Backpiece
text.firstperson.option.cosmetic.boots.@: Selection of multiplayer synced custom 3d models
text.firstperson.option.cosmetic.playerS: Visually (in 3rd person) changes the player size
text.firstperson.option.cosmetic.modifyC: Changes the first person camera height to the player size. This will cause issues with anticheats and might get you banned! Do not use on 3rd party servers! (Sneak once to update the height)
text.firstperson.option.skinlayer.skinLa: Same setting values as for the Head layer, but applies to the rest of the skin.
text.firstperson.option.skinlayer.player: Replace the player skin with the Player Head's skin that is worn
